original_text: So then, it is God who decides these things. It is not because of what people want. It is not because of what people do. It is because God chooses to be kind.
korean_text: 그런즉 원하는 자로 말미암음도 아니요 달음박질하는 자로 말미암음도 아니요 오직 긍휼히 여기시는 하나님으로 말미암음이니라

sentences.original_text: So then, it is God who decides these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님께서 이 모든 것을 결정하십니다.

sentences.original_text: It is not because of what people want.
It is not because of what people do.
It is because God chooses to be kind.
